pullRequest.title: Add custom keys to Crashlytics reports

commit.message: Add custom keys to Crashlytics reports

nodes.bodyText: How do you feel about Collections.emptyMap() (or ImmutableMap.of())
Not sure it matters, but just a note here that unmodifiable maps can still change, just not by the user of the returned value.
Since this is a copy, you might consider setting a capacity, e.g., new ArrayList<>(attributes.size())
